title: Bill Ackman backs Mark Zuckerberg’s Meta with $2B investment
description: Billionaire activist investor Bill Ackman has poured roughly $2 billion into Meta, making a major bet that Mark Zuckerberg’s tech giant will outpace rivals in the artificial intelligence arms race.
content:

title: founders’ departures as SpaceX merger sets stage for trillion

title: Don't get your hopes up for AI-enabled Siri in iOS 26.4
description: iOS 26.4 may not live up to expectations. Apple is struggling to complete a long-delayed artificial intelligence upgrade for Siri.
content: iOS 26.4 could turn out to be a dud. The long-delayed artificial intelligence enhancements for Apple’s Siri digital assistant that had been eagerly expected to launch in the next iPhone software update are reportedly not anywhere close to being ready... [3401 chars]
